channel.title: CVE Feed for Cisco -- Cisco Aironet Access Point Software (IOS XE Controller)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cisco -- Cisco Aironet Access Point Software (IOS XE Controller)

item.title: CVE-2021-1439|2024-09-17T00:36:15.272Z -- cisco -- cisco%20aironet%20access%20point%20software%20%28ios%20xe%20controller%29
item.description: A vulnerability in the multicast DNS (mDNS) gateway feature of Cisco Aironet Series Access Points Software could allow an unauthenticated, adjacent attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) condition on an affected device. This vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation of incoming mDNS traffic. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted mDNS packet to an affected device through a wireless network that is configured in FlexConnect local switching mode or through a wired network on a configured mDNS VLAN. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to cause the access point (AP) to reboot, resulting in a DoS condition.
